content.p: Harnessing diverse expertise to develop life-saving technology This cluster brings together more than 150 academics and clinical academics developing technological innovations for healthcare and wellbeing. Building on our close partnership with Nottingham University Hospitals NHS Trust, we will harness the diverse expertise of the Centre for Healthcare Technologies (CHT) together with the Sir Peter Mansfield Imaging Centre (SPMIC), using interdisciplinary research to address challenge-led research questions and accelerate their translation to clinical adoption. About our research
